name: 威廉·维恩
bio_short: 德国物理学家，因其对热辐射定律（黑体辐射）的研究而获得了1911年的诺贝尔物理学奖。他的“维恩位移定律”和“维恩近似”是普朗克量子理论的关键垫脚石。
bio_short_en: A German physicist who won the 1911 Nobel Prize in Physics for his work on thermal radiation (black-body radiation). His 'Wien's Displacement Law' and 'Wien Approximation' were critical stepping stones to Planck's quantum theory.
